name: Explosimo
description:
In a time far far in the future where the earth is much older, its core energy has almost depleted. To prevent earth from dying slowly, a robot so called Explosimo comes into play. He lives in a small orbital station and is designated to reach the core from heaven through the mines. At the very bottom Explosimo will be able to infuse it with a massive blast of pure energy and restore its full power again.
Get down to earth and help Explosimo fulfill his mission.

In this game you have to setup and manually detonate explosive barrels to move Explosimo through each stage. He cannot walk but is kind of indestructible. Use this to your advantage.

The controls are pretty simple. Left mouseclick on a reddish barrel, move the green arrow in the direction of the force and finish the action again with the left mouse button. It's possible to set the input keys for each barrel manually but auto key  layout is recommended. Last but no least: slower is often faster ;)

We always appreciate any feedback or comments! :)
